message.body: Ha! Where is this?! Also, if you nail down a weekend, I can buy my ticket now!
take your time though :)
So excited!
Also lol to Alec getting his gums partly removed bc he didn't go to the dentist for years
Go to the dentist! Haha duh
He's in so much pain and it is funny bc I'm awful
Omg that's terrible
It's in the train station here at boston
I'll call My gpa when I get home
Yayayay
Does may 7 to 10 work for you?
Actually I could probably leave the fifth or sixth
Of course, and I'll take care of the delivery, if necessary!
My grandpa said that
Ok so u look for tickets
Actually hold on
Let me see if he has miles

Henri Hodara: 5 to 11 May OK. 1. If you leave on the 11 it'll have to be either early in the morning from Orange County airport (SNA) or late in the evening from either SNA or LAX because I have a telephone meeting beginning at 1:00 PM and I'll have prepare for it. 2. Saturday evening Desy and I have Season Concert tickets for the philharmonic (great pianist) playing, and if OK I'll get two tickets for you and Ingrid (maybe the experience will have her give birth to a musical prodigy!) 3. May 14 I have to be in Miami for Grand Ma anniversary. Paul and Susan are planning to come down, so check their schedule since I was planning to spend a couple of days with them. 4. As for plane fare or mileage award I'll pay for it either way. If you can get a round trip for $300 or less, I'll pay, if not see how many miles are required both on AA and Delta. Does Ingrid eat
Yes, of course I want to go to the Philharmonic!
Yes, I eat rabbits!
So actually, I have a free flight that I already paid for
And so I have a refund and he doesn't need to pay for my ticket :)
And yes, I would love to have a musical prodigy baby!
I will totally be the kind of mom to stick my child in piano lessons.
oh I’m looking at tickets now
Wait are you on gchat?
It's May 5th-11 right?
He threw me off with the May 14th info
